data.title: SeeKAT localiser for transients detected in tied-array beams
data.name: SeeKAT
data.description: A code for localising a single pulse detected in multiple interferometer beams.

evidence: "Usage: python SeeKAT.py -f {coordinates file} -p {.fits file} --r {PSF resolution} --o {fractional overlap}" (command-line tool run directly by users)

"Reads in list of detections (RA, Dec, S/N) and the beam PSF... Calculates a likelihood distribution... Plots the likelihood function over RA and Dec" (direct scientific data analysis and visualization for research results)
README shows only direct script usage from the repository, with no mention of package managers, releases, or binaries, implying distribution via cloning/downloading source.
